short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the manufacturing location when looking at an inventory Tesla.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features
URL-Based Analysis: The extension scans the URL to pinpoint key identifiers that may indicate the vehicle's country of manufacture.

Real-Time Feedback: Upon detecting a qualifying URL, the extension will dynamically append the estimated manufacturing origin to the vehicle's title, offering you immediate insight.

Ease of Use: Simply install the extension and browse Tesla's inventory as usual. The extension operates seamlessly in the background.

How to Use
1. Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Navigate to Tesla's inventory page.
3. Click "View Details"
4. Observe the location of manufacture prediction that will appear in to the title of the vehicle you are currently viewing.
